nav.div: Capital School District » Capital School District Calendars

div.p: Capital School District has moved to Online Calendars to provide a quick and easy way for our Families and Community to always know what is happening at Capital. The Calendar below will show you all Capital Schools and District Events. Use the arrow in the upper right of the calendar to filter your view.

input.name: ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$ctl21$hfCanUseMultiSelect

div.style: float: right; position: absolute; display: none

div.p: Below you will find individual subscription links to subscribe to your favorite school. Need to know how to do that? Click here for a brief tutorial.

h3.a:
Subscribe to ALL Schools and District Calendar
(Single Subscription)

em.span:
This will add all school and district events to your calendar at one time under a single subscription.
Please use the individual schools below if you want a more refined view.

li.a: Capital School District and District Office
Capital School District Board of Education

p.span: Each link will provide an iCal link to use with your favorite iCal supported calendar

div.div:
CapitalSchool District
Home of the Senators | Dover, Delaware

div.p: The Capital School District is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions), national origin, citizenship or ancestry, age, disability, marital status, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, or gender identity, against victims of domestic violence, sexual offenses, or stalking, or upon any other categories protected by federal, state, or local law. Inquiries regarding nondiscrimination policies should be directed to the Title IX, District 504 and ADA Coordinators: Capital School District, 198 Commerce Way, Dover DE 19904. Phone 302-672-1500

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved. Content Copyright 2018 Capital School District.
